Package com.example.frontend.model

Class PaintView

  • java.lang.Object
    • View
      • com.example.frontend.model.PaintView
  • public class PaintView
extends View
    Instantiates a new modified View class, presenting a new "paint" for our drawing method Our drawing class implements four required classes for a drawing method - a bitmap, Canvas, path, and a metrics method

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      PaintView​(Context context)
      Instantiates a modified new View method, with context from our Activity
      PaintView​(Context context, AttributeSet attrs)
      Instantiates a modified new View method with an attribute from the XML file and context from our Activity as well as instantiating most Paint methods from the Paint class/library

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void init​(DisplayMetrics metrics)
      Instantiates both the bitmap class and the Canvas class as required for a drawing class.
      protected void onDraw​(Canvas canvas)
      Overrides View's onDraw method with the previously instantiated Canvas.
      boolean onTouchEvent​(MotionEvent event)
      Overrides the onTouchEvent, on a new event (in this case the user looking to draw on the screen) then tracks where the user first started drawing, to their changing x and y - presenting a stroke for every change.
      void setColor​(int color)
      Collects color from the user baed on their input in-game

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

        Instantiates a modified new View method, with context from our Activity

      • PaintView

        public PaintView​(Context context,
                 AttributeSet attrs)
        Instantiates a modified new View method with an attribute from the XML file and context from our Activity as well as instantiating most Paint methods from the Paint class/library
        Parameters:

    • Method Detail

      • setColor

        public void setColor​(int color)
        Collects color from the user baed on their input in-game
        Parameters:
        color - - user's input based on buttons

      • init

        public void init​(DisplayMetrics metrics)
        Instantiates both the bitmap class and the Canvas class as required for a drawing class. also sets the color and stroke width based on user input (again, based on buttons)
        Parameters:
        metrics - : used for keep track and avoid user from going out of bounds of their screen

      • onDraw

        protected void onDraw​(Canvas canvas)
        Overrides View's onDraw method with the previously instantiated Canvas. This method also instantiates the Paint method, feeding in the Android Path library into its values.

      • onTouchEvent

        public boolean onTouchEvent​(MotionEvent event)
        Overrides the onTouchEvent, on a new event (in this case the user looking to draw on the screen) then tracks where the user first started drawing, to their changing x and y - presenting a stroke for every change. Antialaising techniques within the Bitmap allow for it to look smooth and silky.
        Parameters:
        event - - ports in a new event from the activity.
